101625.召喚士の指輪は 光に包まれて消えた！: Summoner's Ring vanished in a flash of light!

101626.「私は……ずっと……\n ずっとずっと…… つらかったんだ……。:
I... have... been... hard... on myself for a
long, long time...

101627.「お前は 本当に いい奴だから…… \n 私は 私自身の みにくい 妬みの感情を:
Because you're a really good guy... I had to
suppress my own ugly feelings of envy... I had
to...

101628.「わ 私は……グガ…… もう限界だった……\n オマエの才能の前で わ 私のドリ:
I... gah.. had reached my limit... in front
of your talent. I was... pointless...
confronted... with... a gah...

101629.「コッ コノ 宝珠と…… ワタシの召喚術デ…… \n はジメて 超えられると思ッ:
With the pearl and my summoning technique, you
think you can beat me!? Don't even try.

101630.「オマエニ……グゲッ ソバニイル ニンゲンノ\n イタミガ ワカル ハズガ ナイ: YOU! YOU! YOU! GAH! YOU! YOU!!!

101634.「ハァ……ハァ……\n 邪法に手を染めても……ついに\n お前を 超えることは:
*Huff* *Huff* All of the evil in the world
could not even get the better of you..

101635.「私は お前に友情を感じる反面 その才能を\n 心底うらやんでいた……その 怪物:
I felt friendship for you, but I also envied
your talent so deeply that I couldn't help but
feel like a monster...

101636.「私のしたことが 許されるとは思っていない。 \n だが これでもう 罪を重ねな:
I don't expect you to forgive me for what I
did. But I guess I don't have to repeat my
sins anymore... thank you..

101639.……中央塔の最上層で 見たものは\n今までにないくらい 凶悪な魔人と融合して\n:
...I saw on the top floor of the center tower
the most vicious Demon Linjara I've ever seen,
fused with a monster.

101640.これ以上 被害を出させないために\n俺は アイツもろとも この時空の狭間に\n転:
In order to prevent further damage, I had no
choice but to transfer myself and him to this
spacetime rift.

101641.アイツは 俺やエテーネへの憎悪をさけびながら\n襲いかかってきた。戦いは何日も続:
He attacked me, screaming his hatred for me
and Ethene. The battle went on for days, and
we fought to the Limits Beyond Limits.

101642.思えばこれが 初めてのケンカだったな。\nいつ倒されても おかしくない状況だった:
Thinking back, this was our first fight. It was a situation where I could have been killed at any moment, but during that
time, I wonder if we were having fun...

101643.最後には アイツも どこか清々しい表情で\n君と 全力で戦うことができて よかっ:
In the end, he looked somewhat refreshed and said he was glad he could fight with me with all his strength... and passed away as if
he was asleep.

101644.俺は もう 全てのチカラを使い果たして\nここから戻ることは できそうにないが…:
I've used up all my energy and I'm not sure
I'll ever come back from this, but if I saved
his soul, I'll be happy with that.

101645.ただ ひとつだけ 心残りなのは……\nお前の成長を 見守れないことだ。:
My only regret is that I won't be able to
watch you grow up.

101646.だから せめて この想いを\n結晶に込めて 送ろうと思う。:
So I'm going to at least put this thought into
crystals and send them to you.

102945.我が子 <pc>よ……\nこの世界を愛し 強く生きろ。\nお前が よき友に 出会:
My child <pc>... love this world and
live strong. I hope you find a good friend.
